c74object.name: gtm.markov

inlet.description: A transition matrix is compiled from the input list of integers and a bang is outputted from the fourth outlet upon completion of transition matrix compilation. When a new list of integers is received, the previously stored transtion matrix inside gtm.markov is overwritten.
A new output value based on the information stored in the internal transition matrix upon receipt of a bang. Generated values are outputted from the first outlet.
Resets the generation of values without clearing the internally stored transition matrix.

outlet.digest: Bang upon completion of transition matrix compilation.

c74object.description: An external for generating second-order Markov chains.
c74object.digest: An external for generating second-order Markov chains.
